doc:
Hand_That_Rocks_the_Cradle http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hand_That_Rocks_the_Cradle 0 The Hand That Rocks the Cradle is a 1992 American psychological thriller film directed by Curtis Hanson, and starring Annabella Sciorra and Rebecca De Mornay. The tale follows a vengeful, psychopathic nanny out to destroy a naïve woman and steal her family. The title is taken from an 1865 poem by William Ross Wallace. The Hand That Rocks the Cradle is a 1992 American psychological thriller film directed by Curtis Hanson, and starring Annabella Sciorra and Rebecca De Mornay. The tale follows a vengeful, psychopathic nanny out to destroy a naïve woman and steal her family. The title is taken from an 1865 poem by William Ross Wallace.
